mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_ID FROM KKATOK.CHATROOMPARTICIPATE WHERE USER_ID = #{my_id} INTERSECT SELECT cp.CHAT_ID FROM KKATOK.CHATROOMPARTICIPATE cp INNER JOIN KKATOK.CHATROOM c ON cp.CHAT_ID = c.CHAT_ID WHERE cp.USER_ID = #{friend_id} AND c.ROOM_TYPE = '1'

SELECT ci.USER_ID, ci.CHAT_MESSAGE, cr.CHAT_TITLE, TO_CHAR(ci.CHAT_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CHAT_REGDATE FROM KKATOK.CHATINFO ci INNER JOIN KKATOK.CHATROOM cr ON ci.CHAT_ID = cr.CHAT_ID WHERE ci.CHAT_ID = #{chat_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY CHAT_REGDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KKATOK.CHATROOM( CHAT_ID, ROOM_TYPE) VALUES( KKATOK.CHATROOM_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, '1')
INSERT INTO KKATOK.CHATROOM( CHAT_ID, ROOM_TYPE, CHAT_TITLE) VALUES( KKATOK.CHATROOM_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, 'N', #{chat_title} )
mapper.select: WITH LatestChat AS ( SELECT CI.CHAT_ID, CI.ROOM_TYPE, CI.CHAT_TITLE, CI.USER_ID, C.CHAT_MESSAGE, C.CHAT_REGDATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CI.CHAT_ID ORDER BY C.CHAT_REGDATE DESC) AS rn FROM KKATOK.CHATINFO C RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(RI.CHAT_ID) AS CHAT_ID, MIN(RI.ROOM_TYPE) AS ROOM_TYPE, MIN(RI.CHAT_TITLE) AS CHAT_TITLE, MIN(C.USER_ID) AS USER_ID FROM KKATOK.CHATROOMPARTICIPATE C INNER JOIN ( SELECT C.CHAT_ID, ROOM_TYPE, CHAT_TITLE FROM KKATOK.CHATROOM C WHERE C.CHAT_ID IN ( SELECT CHAT_ID FROM KKATOK.CHATROOMPARTICIPATE WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} ) ) RI ON RI.CHAT_ID = C.CHAT_ID WHERE USER_ID != #{user_id} GROUP BY RI.CHAT_ID ) CI ON CI.CHAT_ID = C.CHAT_ID ) SELECT CHAT_ID, ROOM_TYPE, CHAT_TITLE, USER_ID, CHAT_MESSAGE, CHAT_REGDATE FROM LatestChat WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY CHAT_REGDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KKATOK.CHATINFO (CHAT_ID, USER_ID, CHAT_MESSAGE) VALUES(#{chat_id}, #{user_id}, #{chat_message})
